favourite.article: Lord, set me a seal on Thine Heart!
Lord make us crazy lovers for you all the days of my Life, Lord make us the testimony of Your recovery. Praise the Lord!
Dear Lord, open mine ear, at the doorpost of God’s house, responding to Thy voice, I would be Thine and Thine forever. Lord, we love You. Do come quickly!
Lord, our deepest longing is Your return! COME LORD JESUS!!
Lord, indeed I long for Your return! My desire for You so intensified every time I sing this beautiful song. I confess my love to You, o Lord, how good and merciful Thou Art!
Praise the Lord, truly we need to redeem the precious moments to enjoy His love divine
Responding to Thy voice!!!
Lord, make us useful for Your economy.
Lord Jesus, I just love You.
Lord, we consecrate again ourselves to You to become Your testimony here on earth! Lord Jesus, we love You! Lord Jesus, I love You!

The Lord is so dear and near to our heart! I am very much refreshed when I first listened to this song. How we need to re-consecrate ourselves to Him!
May the Lord gain all our hearts for Him!
Oh Lord refresh our consecration to become a living testimony in this present age. May You preserve our family life wholly for Your economy.

Lord Jesus we thank You for such a love toward us. We thank and praise You for all that You are to us. Lord we want to declare that we love You with our best love. Thank You for Your unchanging love and Your everlasting love. We just want to pour out our all to You and to Your economy. We love You Lord!!!!!!!

Lord, make us Your crazy lovers through all our days. How we long to marry You at Your coming. We press into You today in our calling so as to match You in every way as Your corporate bride. We also thank You for such a living testimony that we get to enjoy with our earthly bride.
Lord Jesus I still Love You. Dear Lord open mine ear, responding to Thine voice.
Jesus, You are my life. You are so sweet to me. I want to become Your testimony.
I love Jesus! I am from Vietnam.

Lord, You lead me to walk through all the darkness, that I can enjoy You as my life in this place. Praise the Lord You are in me, and I am in You! We are building ourselves into the New Jerusalem with Your divine life!!
Lord, cause us to be fully consecrated unto You to be a living testimony.
Set me a seal on Thine heart, With Thy love, even Thy jealousy, Let me be Thy crazy lover Through all my days.
Praise the Lord. Lord, cause us to be Your crazy lover, always loving You all the days of our life. Draw us and attract us Lord more and more each day. Amen.
This song really touches my heart deeply and remind me of my consecration. Lord, I would be Thine and Thine forever.
Oh Lord Jesus! Let us be Thy crazy lover Through all our days.
Lord make us Your living testimony. Lord, I continually love You...
May we be those who always respond to His voice, and be His crazy lover through all our days.
This song reminds me of FTTM. To the Body's reality, in Thine intensification. Make us the testimony of Jesus.

This song remains me when I was in FTTM. When the middle age trainees from Taiwan sang this song last 2010, a marvelous exhibition that night happen. But a fresh revival from my spirit that we need to become the TESTIMONY OF JESUS wherever we go and whatever we do.
This song reminds me about my consecration and that is, to become the testimony of JESUS.
Lord, let me be Thy crazy lover through all my days.

Jesus Lord, truly I love Thee; My heart refine! I'd redeem each precious moment, To enjoy Thy love divine. Lord, behold, all to Thee I yield, Constrained this day By compassions never failing, Thy perfecting care, Dear Lord, open mine ear, At the doorpost of God's house, Responding to Thy voice, I would be Thine and Thine forever, Set me a seal on Thine heart, With Thy love, even Thy jealousy, Let me be Thy crazy lover Through all my days.

Responding to Thy voice, I would be Thine and Thine forever.. No longer I live, but Christ lived in me.. Because I have been crucified with Him, so my body, my life, my future, my everything, they all belong to Him. Yet I still live in my flesh. Oh Lord, set me a seal on Thine heart, with Thy love, even Thy jealousy, let me be Thy crazy lover through all my days. Amen.
Lord gain me fully......

Make me a crazy lover of You, Lord through all of my days. I want to enjoy You to the uttermost. Lead me, Lord to the mingled spirit always to experience the reality of the Body. Make me, Lord a testimony of You. Gain me more Lord and live in me Lord so I can live a life living in You, Lord. I love You, Lord. I just love You, Lord.
Responding to Thy voice, I would be Thine and Thine forever... Set me a seal on Thine heart, with Thy love, even Thy jealousy... Let me be Thy crazy lover through all my days.

Lord, behold, all to Thee I yield, Constrained this day By compassions never failing, Thy perfecting care, Dear Lord, open mine ear, At the doorpost of God's house, Responding to Thy voice, I would be Thine and Thine forever, Set me a seal on Thine heart, With Thy love, even Thy jealousy, Let me be Thy crazy lover Through all my days...
Jesus Lord, truly I love Thee; My heart refine! I'd redeem each precious moment, To enjoy Thy love divine.

Our giving ourselves to the Lord is our proof that we love Him only Him. The more we see how lovely and precious the Lord is, the more we will say "Lord I don't have anything that I can give to You but myself". We are slaves having bought with a highest price by the blood of our Lord a priceless blood. We need to say to the Lord. " Lord open my ear at the doorpost of God's house, Responding to Your voice, Lord, You are my Master. I love You!!!"
Dear Lord, open mine ear at the door post of God's house.
Lord, I would be Thine and Thine forever.
Lord Jesus I love You! Let me be Thy crazy lover Through all my days.
O Lord keep us loving You day by day. Redeem all my time to enjoy Your love and grace.Oh Lord! Come quickly as You have promised long before.Your returning is our only desire.

I love You, Lord Jesus. Thank You, Lord for keeping in loving me. Make me the testimony of Jesus O Lord! For this we yearn! Quickly come, as once Thou promised! Lord, our deepest longing Is Thy return! Amen.
Lord, make me Your crazy lover! I want to love You more and more day by day. I am here for You, Lord. Amen.

May the Lord make us love it and be crazy for Him every day ... Brethren, I am a brother of the Portuguese language and want to know what it is called in English the hymn number 477. If they can also tell the author that wrote it. Jesus is Lord!
Lord Jesus, I love You!!! Praise the Lord! Lord, let me be Thy crazy lover through all my days...
It's encouraging to see all the fresh comments from saints from around the world. Praise the Lord. We are in one Spirit.
Lord, constrain us with Your love. Set us a seal on Your heart with Your love and even Your jealousy and let us be Your crazy lovers throughout all our days!
I love You Lord, with all my heart!!!
I like this song much more encouraging, to grant us the Lord to be His testimony today and keep us crazy lovers of Him until His coming. Hallelujah!!!
This song was sung yesterday in a wedding meeting. So encouraged. Lord, make us crazy lovers with Your love, even Your jealousy. Make us the testimony of Jesus in Your intensification!
The first time I sang this hymn was in Taiwan when visiting the FTTT. Sweet, sweet blending.
My ambition and desire is to become the testimony of You, Lord. Redeem all my time to enjoy Your love and grace.
I love You Lord!
Yes, Lord, redeem all my time to enjoy Your love and grace.
Lord, I pray that my desire on this earth is nothing but Your second coming. Make my desire pure. Redeem all my time to enjoy Your love and grace. I really love You Lord Jesus! Amen!

Yes, Lord! When You call, I want to be faithful to You forever...set me as a seal on Your heart with love and jealousy...and let me be Your crazy lover all my life... I love You Lord!
Thank you for the song...
Oh, my Lord Jesus, let me be YOUR crazy lover all my life. Lord, I DEVOTE unto YOUR divine economy. COME QUICKLY as You have promised. Lord JESUS, YOUR RETURNING is our ONLY DESIRE!

Amen Lord. In my mingled spirit, bring me to reality of the Body of Christ, Enjoy Your intensified salvation, become the testimony of Jesus. Oh Lord, set me as a seal ! Make me your crazy lover all my whole life! Oh Lord Jesus! everything is just for You alone and your eternal economy! Your good pleasure! Lord, gain us fully!
The words to this song are so precious! O Lord, keep us loving You!
